eventSummary: Get ready to unleash your inner superhero as we dive into a thrilling 24-hour hackathon inspired by the legendary Marvel Avengers! Just like Earth’s Mightiest Heroes, participants will unite to solve challenges, harness their unique powers, and create extraordinary solutions to tackle real-world problems—all while drawing inspiration from the iconic Marvel Universe.
